STOPSHOP

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS: SHIPPING AND DELIVERY

How do I receive my order if I am not at home?

As long as the person appointed or authorized to receive the delivery package at your nominated address has a signed authorization letter and your actual valid ID, the person may receive the delivery on your behalf

I haven't received my order.

If there is a delay, it will be indicated on the carrier's website. In the circumstance that you have not seen a status update of your delivery after a week since receiving the delivery confirmation e-mail, please contact our Customer Center for further assistance.

My order is delayed. When will I received it?

Most of the packages are delivered on time. On rare occasions, orders may be delivered after the estimated delivery date.

  • Please note that delays may caused by:
    • Late fulfillment by seller or warehouse
    • Delayed handover to our courier (via pickup/ drop-off)
    • A high volume of orders in sort centers or logistic hubs
    • Inclement weather
    • Road closures
    • Logistic problems

If your package is late, please monitor it's order status on your app by following the instructions on this page.

Can I change my delivery address after my order has been placed?

You can change your address after placing an order only if you meet all 3 criteria:

  • Seller has not arranged shipment for your order (for STOPSHOP Supported Logistics).
  • You have not made payment or payment has not been confirmed (for non-STOPSHOP Supported Logistics).
  • You have not requested a change of address for the order before. Delivery address can only be changed once for each order.

If you meet all the above criteria, you may proceed to change your delivery address.

Do you offer international shipping?

We offer delivery services within the areas covered by our authorized courier in the Philippines

Are there additional fees for items shipped from overseas?

You can find the widest assortment of all around products - including items only available from our overseas partner in different countries.

To provide you the most value for your purchases, we keep our international shipping and handling fees to a minimum. However, items that are shipped from overseas and above a set minimum amount may incur non-refundable international handling fees.

  • IMPORTANT
    • International handling fees are only charged to items that are shipped from overseas.
    • Orders that are charged international handling fees are ineligible for cash on delivery.
    • Only orders above PHP 10,000 will be charged PHP 1495 international handling fees.

How much is the cost for the delivery?

We offer free shipping for a single receipt purchase of PHP 2,500.00 and above. Delivery cost below the purchase of PHP 2,500.00 is PHP 120.00 to areas covered by our authorized courier in the Philippines.
